title: Is California Governor Jerry Brown dating schools that show students 'angry sex'?
subtitle: No one but the junk news sites says that California should use "gay porn" in primary schools to teach children about gay, gay, bisexual and transgender sex.
author: Bethania Palma
vclaim: The Governor of California, Jerry Brown, has requested the use of homosexual pornography in primary schools in order to teach children about the sex of lesbian, gay, bisexual and transgender persons.
